thread.title: Elvis' grandkids in care as their mum Lisa Marie claims her husband had indecent child pictures
thread.title_full: Elvis' grandkids in care as their mum Lisa Marie claims her husband had indecent child pictures

author: Christopher Bucktin
title: Elvis' grandkids in care as their mum Lisa Marie claims her husband had indecent child pictures
text:
Celebs Elvis' grandkids in care as their mum Lisa Marie claims her husband had indecent child pictures Lisa Marie Presley - the only child of music legend Elvis - said she was “sick to my stomach” on making her discovery Share Lisa Marie Presley and Michael Lockwood (Photo: PA) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Lisa Marie Presley ’s eight-year-old twin daughters have been taken into care, it has been claimed. 
It came as reports emerged she found indecent images of children on their dad’s computer. 
Finley and Harper Lockwood, granddaughters of rocker Elvis , will reportedly be in care until a trial next month. 
In court papers filed as part of her ongoing divorce from musician Michael Lockwood, 55, Lisa Marie reportedly also said she was “horrified and sick to my stomach” at her “disturbing” discovery. Elvis Presley (Photo: ITV) 
She is said to claim in the papers, filed in LA, that Beverly Hills police took 80 of Lockwood’s devices during a raid at her home, adding: “Tennessee law enforcement is also conduct­­ing an investigation related to the photos and videos.” 
Singer Lisa Marie, 49, wed fourth husband Lockwood in Japan in 2006. They split in June. Like us on Facebook
